title: 急急急 ！创造模式怎么做床
author: superwu1998
txt_content: 创造模式怎么做床啊我的空中别墅啥都不差就差床了- -[img]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator.T5HXUM8VVQ0RKKY/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/237000914/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/D$9VHYQOS1]V[[4AZ)I%25L%60B.jpg[/img][img]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator.T5HXUM8VVQ0RKKY/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/237000914/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/5G6COU$[K%25$EKT)NDIF]ZY0.jpg[/img][img]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator.T5HXUM8VVQ0RKKY/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/237000914/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/M0NTM4(8LUTDBC[T8K4%7D97O.jpg[/img][img]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator.T5HXUM8VVQ0RKKY/Application%20Data/Tencent/Users/237000914/QQ/WinTemp/RichOle/%25@K%7BJZ5GQWHYS2V6Y3)2[DH.jpg[/img]

replies.author: shizhenxing1
replies.txt_content:
创造能拿= =，如果你非得要自己合成= =
拿羊毛和木材，在工作台上合成吧

replies.author: 血煞灬小侠
replies.txt_content: 床吗？你可以在按E，有花的图图那里点一下，往下翻就有了

replies.author: Neubulaeko
replies.txt_content: 本地路经没有用的，不能有图，要上传到网上

replies.author: renyichao
replies.txt_content: 先按e，然后在装饰性用品里面找，最下面有床。

非正式版没有方块分类，作不了床的！
惨惨惨啊！

replies.author: superwu1998
replies.txt_content:
